trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that can be written to and updated.
trans-unit.target: Gir et <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> som kan skrives til og oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: Use the WriteableBitmap class to update and render a bitmap on a per-frame basis.
trans-unit.target: Bruk WriteableBitmap klassen og for å oppdatere gjengi punktgrafikk på basis per ramme.

trans-unit.source: This is useful for generating algorithmic content, such as a fractal image, and for data visualization, such as a music visualizer.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig for å generere algorithmic innhold, for eksempel en fractal bilde, og datavisualisering, for eksempel en musikk visualizer.

trans-unit.source: The WriteableBitmap class uses two buffers.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WriteableBitmap bruker to buffere.

trans-unit.source: The *back buffer* is allocated in system memory and accumulates content that is not currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: Den *tilbake bufferen* er tildelt i systemminne og akkumulerer innhold som ikke vises.

trans-unit.source: The *front buffer* is allocated in system memory and contains the content that is currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: Den *front bufferen* er tildelt i systemminne og har innhold som vises for øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: The rendering system copies the front buffer to video memory for display.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelse kopieres front bufferen til video minne for visning.

trans-unit.source: Two threads use these buffers.
trans-unit.target: To tråder Bruk buffere.

trans-unit.source: The *user interface (UI) thread* generates the UI but does not present it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Den *bruker brukergrensesnittet (UI) tråd* genererer Brukergrensesnittet, men ikke viser den skjermen.

trans-unit.source: The UI thread responds to user input, timers, and other events.
trans-unit.target: UI-tråden svarer på brukerinndata, tidtakerne og andre hendelser.

trans-unit.source: An application can have multiple UI threads.
trans-unit.target: Et program kan ha flere Brukergrensesnittet tråder.

trans-unit.source: The *render thread* composes and renders changes from the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Den *gjengi tråd* skriver og gjengir endringer fra UI-tråden.

trans-unit.source: There is only one render thread per application.
trans-unit.target: Det er bare én gjengivelse tråd per program.

trans-unit.source: The UI thread writes content to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: UI-tråden skriver innhold til tilbake bufferen.

trans-unit.source: The render thread reads content from the front buffer and copies it to video memory.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelse tråden leser innhold fra front bufferen og kopieres til video minne.

trans-unit.source: Changes to the back buffer are tracked with changed rectangular regions.
trans-unit.target: Endringer tilbake bufferen spores med endrede rektangulære områder.

trans-unit.source: Call one of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%2A> overloads to update and display content in the back buffer automatically.
trans-unit.target: Ringe en av de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%2A>overlastingene Oppdater for å vise innholdet i tilbake bufferen automatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%2A>

trans-unit.source: For greater control over updates, and for multi-threaded access to the back buffer, use the following workflow.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollere oppdateringer, og for flere tråder tilgang til tilbake bufferen, bruker du følgende arbeidsflyt.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A> method to reserve the back buffer for updates.
trans-unit.target: Kall av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>metode for å reservere tilbake bufferen for oppdateringer.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Obtain a pointer to the back buffer by accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.BackBuffer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hente en peker til tilbake bufferen ved å åpne den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.BackBuffer%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.BackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Write changes to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Skrive endringene til tilbake bufferen.

trans-unit.source: Other threads may write changes to the back buffer when the WriteableBitmap is locked.
trans-unit.target: Andre tråder kan skrive endringene til tilbake bufferen når WriteableBitmap er låst.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A> method to indicate areas that have changed.
trans-unit.target: Kall av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A>metode for å angi områder som er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> method to release the back buffer and allow presentation to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Kall den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>metoden frigjøre tilbake bufferen for å tillate presentasjon på skjermen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>

trans-unit.source: When updates are sent to the rendering thread, the rendering thread copies the changed rectangles from the back buffer to the front buffer.
trans-unit.target: Når oppdateringene er sendt til gjengivelse tråden, kopierer gjengivelse tråden endret rektanglene fra tilbake bufferen til front bufferen.

trans-unit.source: The rendering system controls this exchange to avoid deadlocks and redraw artifacts, such as "tearing".
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelse av systemet, kontrollerer denne exchange for å unngå vranglås og tegne artefakter, for eksempel "får".

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"></xref> class using the given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%29> constructor is preferred over using this constructor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%29>konstruktør er foretrukket over ved hjelp av denne konstruktøren.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%29>

trans-unit.source: If `source` does not use a natively supported bitmap format, format conversions are applied for each frame update, which reduces performance.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `source` bruker ikke en opprinnelig støttes punktgrafikkformat, konverteringer brukes for hver for oppdatering, noe som reduserer ytelse-format.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> to use for initialization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> skal brukes for initialisering.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"></xref> class with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"> </xref> klassen med de angitte parameterne.

trans-unit.source: The preferred values for `pixelFormat` are <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Bgr32%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Foretrukket verdiene for `pixelFormat` og <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Bgr32%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Bgr32%2A>

trans-unit.source: These formats are natively supported and do not require a format conversion.
trans-unit.target: Disse formatene støttes opprinngelig og krever ikke en formatkonvertering som.

trans-unit.source: Other `pixelFormat` values require a format conversion for each frame update, which reduces performance.
trans-unit.target: Andre `pixelFormat` verdier krever en konvertering av filformat for hver for oppdatering, noe som reduserer ytelse.

trans-unit.source: The desired width of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Ønsket bredden på bildet.

trans-unit.source: The desired height of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Ønsket høyden på bildet.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Vannrett [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for punktgrafikken.

trans-unit.source: The vertical [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](../Token/TLA%23tla_dpi_md.md)] of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Loddrett [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](../Token/TLA%23tla_dpi_md.md)] for punktgrafikken.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref> of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"> </xref> for punktgrafikken.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref> of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"> </xref> for punktgrafikken.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the area of the bitmap that changed.
trans-unit.target: Angir området i punktgrafikken som endres.

trans-unit.source: Call the AddDirtyRect method to indicate changes your code has made to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Kall AddDirtyRect-metoden til å angi endringer koden utførte tilbake bufferen.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method multiple times, the changed areas are accumulated in a sufficient, but not necessarily minimal, representation.
trans-unit.target: Når du kaller opp denne metoden flere ganger, blir endret områdene akkumulert i en tilstrekkelig, men ikke nødvendigvis minimum representasjon.

trans-unit.source: For efficiency, only the areas that are marked as dirty are guaranteed to be copied forward to the front buffer.
trans-unit.target: Bare områder som er merket som skadet garanteres for effektivitet, som skal kopieres fremover til front bufferen.

trans-unit.source: However, any portion of the bitmap may be copied forward, so you must ensure that the entire back buffer is always valid.
trans-unit.target: Deler av punktgrafikken kan imidlertid kopieres til fremover, slik at må du kontrollere at hele tilbake bufferen alltid er gyldig.

trans-unit.source: Call the AddDirtyRect method only between calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> methods, as described in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> class remarks.
trans-unit.target: Kall metoden AddDirtyRect bare mellom kallene til den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>metoder, som beskrevet i den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>klasse merknader.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"></xref> representing the area that changed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"> </xref> som representerer området som endres.

trans-unit.source: Dimensions are in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Dimensjoner er angitt i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The bitmap has not been locked by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock*> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.TryLock*> methods.
trans-unit.target: Punktgrafikken har ikke blitt låst av et kall til den <> </> *> eller <> </> *> metoder.

trans-unit.source: dirtyRect falls outside the bounds of the .
trans-unit.target: dirtyRectfaller utenfor grensene for den .

trans-unit.source: Gets a pointer to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Henter en peker til den tilbake bufferen.

trans-unit.source: The back buffer contains the bitmap contents in the pixel format requested by the user.
trans-unit.target: Bakre bufferen inneholder punktgrafikk innholdet i pikselformat ble forespurt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Update the back buffer only between calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Oppdater tilbake bufferen bare mellom kallene til den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not follow the Lock/Unlock workflow described in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> class remarks, undefined behaviors, such as tearing, can occur.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke følger Lås/Unlock arbeidsflyten som beskrives i den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>klassen kommentarer, udefinert virkemåter, for eksempel får, kan oppstå.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>

trans-unit.source: The address of the back buffer does not change.
trans-unit.target: Adressen til tilbake bufferen endres ikke.

trans-unit.source: Thread Safety You can pass the BackBuffer pointer to external components and other threads for processing, but if you do, you must provide you own thread coordination.
trans-unit.target: Tråden sikkerhetsnivået du kan sende BackBuffer pekeren til eksterne komponenter og andre tråder for behandling, men hvis du gjør dette, må du oppgi du egen tråd coordination.

trans-unit.source: In particular, you must ensure that the UI thread specifies changed areas by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A> method, and that the UI thread unlocks the buffer by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Spesielt, må du kontrollere at tråden Brukergrensesnittet angir endret områder ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A>metoden, og at tråden Brukergrensesnittet låses bufferen ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> that points to the base address of the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IntPtr>som peker på basisadressen til tilbake bufferen.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the number of bytes in a single row of pixel data.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir antall byte i én rad med data i piksler.

trans-unit.source: An integer indicating the number of bytes in a single row of pixel data.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som angir antall byte i én rad med data i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, denne metoden overfører ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skygger arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering når som helst.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> objektet gjør dype kopier av gjeldende verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Refererer til ressursen, databindinger og animasjoner kopieres ikke, men er gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skygger arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering når som helst.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Reserves the back buffer for updates.
trans-unit.target: Reservert tilbake bufferen for oppdateringer.

trans-unit.source: The Lock method increments the lock count.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Lock øker antallet Lås.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> is locked, the rendering system does not send updates until the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> is fully unlocked by calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>er låst, gjengivelse systemet sender ikke oppdateringer før den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>låses fullstendig kall til den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>

trans-unit.source: You can use the Lock method to support multi-threaded implementations.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke Lock-metoden til å støtte flere tråder implementeringer.

trans-unit.source: In these scenarios, the UI thread locks the bitmap and exposes the back buffer to other threads.
trans-unit.target: I følgende scenarioer UI-tråden låser punktgrafikken og viser tilbake bufferen til andre tråder.

trans-unit.source: When the worker thread has finished a frame, the UI thread adds changed rectangles and unlocks the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Når Arbeidstråden er ferdig ramme, UI-tråden legger til endret rektangler og låses bufferen.

trans-unit.source: The UI thread can block when the render thread acquires a lock on the back buffer to copy it forward to the front buffer.
trans-unit.target: UI-tråden kan blokkere når gjengivelse tråden henter lås på tilbake bufferen å kopiere den frem til front bufferen.

trans-unit.source: If the latency from this block is too long, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.TryLock%2A> method to wait for a short time and then unblock the UI thread to perform other tasks while the back buffer is locked.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ventetid fra denne blokken er for lang tid, bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.TryLock%2A>metoden Vent en liten stund, og låse opp UI-tråd for å utføre andre oppgaver mens tilbake bufferen er låst.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.TryLock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attempts to lock the bitmap, waiting for no longer than the specified length of time.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å låse punktgrafikken, venter ikke lenger enn det angitte tidsrommet.

trans-unit.source: When a lock is acquired, the behavior of the TryLock method is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når en låses, virkemåten for metoden TryLock er lik den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"></xref> that represents the length of time to wait.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"> </xref> som representerer hvor lang tid å vente.

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 0, returnerer umiddelbart.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever*> blocks indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: Verdien <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever*>blokkerer på ubestemt tid.</xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the lock was acquired; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis ble låses; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: timeout is set to .
trans-unit.target: timeouter satt til .

trans-unit.source: Releases the back buffer to make it available for display.
trans-unit.target: Frigir tilbake bufferen for å gjøre den tilgjengelig for visning.

trans-unit.source: The Unlock method decrements the lock count.
trans-unit.target: Unlock-metoden reduseres låsen count.

trans-unit.source: When the lock count reaches 0, a render pass is requested if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: Når Lås antallet når 0, bestått gjengivelse forespørres hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A>har blitt kalt.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The bitmap has not been locked by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock*> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.TryLock*> methods.
trans-unit.target: Punktgrafikken har ikke blitt låst av et kall til den <> </> *> eller <> </> *> metoder.

trans-unit.source: Updates the pixels in the specified region of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer piksler i det angitte området på bildet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> overloads are preferred over using this method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>overlastingene er foretrukne over ved hjelp av denne metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In partial trust, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Delvis klarering bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>overbelaste.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>

trans-unit.source: The rectangle of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"></xref> to update.
trans-unit.target: Rektangelet for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"> </xref> å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: The pixel array used to update the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Pikselbredden matrisen brukes til å oppdatere punktgrafikken.

trans-unit.source: The stride of the update region in `pixels`.
trans-unit.target: Avstand i update-området i `pixels`.

trans-unit.source: The input buffer offset.
trans-unit.target: Inndatabufferen forskyvningen.

trans-unit.source: One or more of the following conditions is true.
trans-unit.target: Én eller flere av følgende betingelser er oppfylt.

trans-unit.source: sourceRect falls outside the bounds of the .
trans-unit.target: sourceRectfaller utenfor grensene for den .

trans-unit.source: stride < 1 offset < 0
trans-unit.target: stride < 1 offset < 0

trans-unit.source: pixels is .
trans-unit.target: pixelsis .

trans-unit.source: pixels has a rank other than 1 or 2, or its length is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: pixelshar en rangering enn 1 eller 2, eller den er mindre enn eller lik 0.

trans-unit.source: Updates the pixels in the specified region of the bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"></xref> to update.
trans-unit.target: Rektangelet for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"> </xref> å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: The input buffer used to update the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Inndatabufferen brukes til å oppdatere punktgrafikken.

trans-unit.source: The size of the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på inndatabufferen.

trans-unit.source: The stride of the update region in `buffer`.
trans-unit.target: Avstand i update-området i `buffer`.

trans-unit.source: One or more of the following conditions is true.
trans-unit.target: Én eller flere av følgende betingelser er oppfylt.

trans-unit.source: sourceRect falls outside the bounds of the .
trans-unit.target: sourceRectfaller utenfor grensene for den .

trans-unit.source: bufferSize < 1 stride < 1
trans-unit.target: bufferSize < 1 stride < 1

trans-unit.source: buffer is .
trans-unit.target: bufferis .

trans-unit.source: Updates the pixels in the specified region of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer piksler i det angitte området på bildet.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> automatically with the contents of `sourceBuffer`.
trans-unit.target: Kall av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%2A>metode for å oppdatere den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>automatisk med innholdet i `sourceBuffer`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is the equivalent of using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> workflow described in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> class remarks.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden tilsvarer ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>arbeidsflyten som beskrives i den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>klasse merknader.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Use this overload in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Bruker denne overlasten i delvis klarering.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle in `sourceBuffer` to copy.
trans-unit.target: Rektangelet i `sourceBuffer` å kopiere.

trans-unit.source: The input buffer used to update the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Inndatabufferen brukes til å oppdatere punktgrafikken.

trans-unit.source: The stride of the input buffer, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden for inndatabufferen, i byte.

trans-unit.source: The destination x-coordinate of the left-most pixel in the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Målet x-koordinaten for lengst til venstre pikselbredden i tilbake bufferen.

trans-unit.source: The destination y-coordinate of the top-most pixel in the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Målet y-koordinaten for øverste pikselbredden i tilbake bufferen.

trans-unit.source: One or more of the following conditions is true.
trans-unit.target: Én eller flere av følgende betingelser er oppfylt.

trans-unit.source: sourceRect falls outside the bounds of the .
trans-unit.target: sourceRectfaller utenfor grensene for den .

trans-unit.source: destinationX or destinationY is outside the bounds of the .
trans-unit.target: destinationXeller destinationY er utenfor grensene for den .

trans-unit.source: sourceBufferStride < 1
trans-unit.target: sourceBufferStride < 1

trans-unit.source: sourceBuffer is .
trans-unit.target: sourceBufferis .

trans-unit.source: sourceBuffer has a rank other than 1 or 2, or its length is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: sourceBufferhar en rangering enn 1 eller 2, eller den er mindre enn eller lik 0.

trans-unit.source: Updates the pixels in the specified region of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer piksler i det angitte området på bildet.

trans-unit.source: Call the WritePixels method to update the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> automatically with the contents of `sourceBuffer`.
trans-unit.target: Kaller WritePixels-metoden til å oppdatere den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>automatisk med innholdet i `sourceBuffer`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is the equivalent of using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> workflow described in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> class remarks.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden tilsvarer ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>arbeidsflyten som beskrives i den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>klasse merknader.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In partial trust, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Delvis klarering bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>overbelaste.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>
